mapper.select: select m.mem_nickname, d.reason , dl.dec_date from member m, decs d, dec_list dl, post p where dl.mem_num=m.mem_num and dl.write_num = p.board_num order by dl.dec_date DESC limit 5;
select am.msg_id, m.mem_nickname, am.write_time from member m, admin_msg am where am.sender = m.mem_num order by am.write_time DESC limit 5;
select mem_num, mem_nickname, mem_regDate from member order by mem_num DESC limit 5;
select p.board_num, m.mem_nickname, p.board_time from post p, member m where p.mem_num=m.mem_num order by p.board_num DESC limit 5;
